message: Is Yahoo pipes the easiest way to build a blog feed aggregator from a list of Nepali hackers?
@himanshuc umm hmmm... that'd be cool though
@alokt_ ahh I see interesting...might give setting that up a shot

@alokt_ For now I am thinking of starting with the people I interact with on twitter like you, tundal45, zaurav and another friend. Also to help motivate myself to document whatever I am trying to learn :D
@alokt_ Do you know if pipe can produce html output from its result which updates the feed automatically?
@himanshuc what blogs do you have in mind?
@alokt_ Basically a list of Nepalis who blog about code!
@himanshuc cool well yahoo pipes is pretty straightforward...
@alokt_ Yeah right now creating a pipe...looks very straightforward for rss feeds!
@himanshuc can't you create a feed that aggregates all and subscribe to it? like on google reader?
@alokt_ I was thinking more along the lines of http://planet.ubuntu.com/
